dcterms:description: A collection of Chinese conversational recommendation sessions constructed in a semi-automatic topic-guided way. It contains 10,000 sessions of 129,392 utterances involving 1,482 users and 33,834 movies.
dcterms:title: TGReDial

dcterms:creator: Raymond Li
Samira Ebrahimi Kahou
Hannes Schulz
Vincent Michalski
Laurent Charlin
Chris Pal
dcterms:description: An English conversational recommendation dataset built manually through crowd-sourcing workers on Amazon Mechanical Turk (AMT). It includes 10,006 dialogues of 182,150 utterances related to 51,699 movies and 504 users.
dcterms:title: ReDial
